yes, there are hackers. yes, there are hackers even with prime status. yes, valve is not able to do sth against it.
BUT i have only encountered a handful of hackers, most matches are pretty fun.
Biggest problem for me are all the 12 year old little childs, especially from russia, but also from other countries, which are ruining my day from time to time. But this is ok, you can mute them and you are good to go.

Everyone's moaning but at the end of the day it's a bloody great game, one of the most major ones and continually growing in e-sports. I would reccomend it, also there's a mute button for the "annoying Russian's" or you could just download a program to not pick Russian servers.
